itemDescription: British swimmer. Olympic athlete, British Empire Games gold medallist

wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Gibson McDowall (born 10 January 1936 in Kilmarnock, Scotland), is a female retired competitive swimmer who represented Scotland.

response: *Margaret McDowall; member of the Scottish swimming team and silver medal winner at the 1952 Helsinki Olympics.
